Package it.polimi.ingsw.am37.client

Class AbstractView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am37.client.AbstractView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliView, GuiView
public abstract class AbstractView extends Object
Class with all abstract methods for printing or displaying images
